name: CW_ABST_MED_REC
description: Medication reconciliation information reported to CROWNWeb, the United States ESRD patient registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: MED_RECONCILIATION_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date when a medication reconciliation was performed for the patient.

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: This item stores the provider who performed the medication reconciliation.

columns.name: PROV_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the provider type of the provider who performed the medication reconciliation.
